title: When is your Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (MRN) dated?
dateLegend: Enter the date from the top right of your MRN letter
titleIba: When is your Review Decision Notice dated?
dateLegendIba: Enter the date from the top right of your Review Decision Notice
imageAltIba: A copy of your Review Decision Notice

error.dayRequired: You have not entered a valid day. Enter a day.
error.monthRequired: You have not entered a valid month. Enter a month.
error.yearRequired: You have not entered a valid year. Enter a year.
error.invalid: You’ve entered an invalid MRN date. Enter the MRN date
error.future: You’ve entered a date in the future. Enter the MRN date
error.dateSameAsImage: You have entered the date from the picture. Look at your own MRN and enter the date shown.
error.allRequiredIba: Enter the Review Decision Notice date.
error.invalidIba: You’ve entered an invalid Review Decision Notice date. Enter the Review Decision Notice date.
error.futureIba: You’ve entered a date in the future. Enter the Review Decision Notice date.
error.dateSameAsImageIba: You have entered the date from the picture. Look at your own Review Decision Notice and enter the date shown.
